p: In addition, this global epidemic crisis indicated that host-species expansion or interspecies transmission of neoteric coronavirus to humans might be unavoidable. Clinicians and researchers should combine efforts to swiftly evolve our perception of all facets of SARS-CoV-2 infections and fill in the gaps concerning the emergence of this virus. Ultimately, we can also learn from this epidemic that we need to improve our disease monitoring and surveillance system to prevent such a serious disease outbreak. Digital technologies such as big-data analytics, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technology may also need to be fully exploited and developed, thereby enabling real-time data collection at scale and modeling risk associations immediately to contain the pathophoresis.
